thread.title: Raiders build big lead, beat Chargers 37-29
thread.title_full: Raiders build big lead, beat Chargers 37-29 - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Vic Tafur
title: Raiders build big lead, beat Chargers 37-29
text:
Photo: Harry How, Getty Images Amari Cooper leaps to make a catch in front of San Diego safety Jimmy Wilson in the second quarter. Cooper also had a 52-yard TD reception during the quarter. Amari Cooper leaps to make a catch in front of San Diego safety...
SAN DIEGO — With 10½ minutes to go in the third quarter, members of the Raiders’ defense were smiling and motioning with their hands for the crowd to get louder. Teammates on the sideline were waving their towels. Amari Cooper leaps to make a catch in front of San Diego safety Jimmy Wilson in the second quarter. Cooper also had a 52-yard TD reception during the quarter. Amari Cooper leaps to make a catch in front of San Diego safety...
SAN DIEGO — With 10½ minutes to go in the third quarter, members of the Raiders’ defense were smiling and motioning with their hands for the crowd to get louder. Teammates on the sideline were waving their towels.
